name: UltraButton
description:
UltraButton 

This is a browser upload of my mobile arcade game. I'm working on a new version, who will roll out soon, with a stronger game and level design I hope.

Try to make a highscore by catching retro sun, its ultra fast moves will give you a hard time ! Play in a graphic universe typed retro wave with a retro ambient music that will keep you busy!

Hope you enjoy !

What's new : 

  • Graphical update
  • New score system
  • Bugfixs.
